publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-4186.3 John Scott: Importance of Aquaculture to the Scottish Economy—As an amendment to motion (S3M-4186) in the name of Roseanna Cunningham, insert at end "and notes the importance of the 6,200 Scottish jobs supported by the aquaculture industry in maintaining the environmental, economic and social fabric in communities often located in Scotland’s most remote and fragile areas."
